dublin_core.dcvalue: The digital revolution in radiology continues to advance rapidly There are a number of interesting developments within radiology informatics which may have a significant impact on education and training of radiologists in the near future These include extended functionality of handheld computers web based skill and knowledge assessment standardization of radiological procedural training using simulated or virtual patients worldwide videoconferencing via high quality health networks such as Internet2 and global collaboration of radiological educational resources via comprehensive multi national databases such as the medical imaging resource centre initiative of the Radiological Society of North America This article will explore the role of e learning in radiology highlight a number of useful web based applications in this area and explain how the current and future technological advances might best be incorporated into radiological training
